mutations.name: Epic Attack-Defense Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a powerful synergy between Attack and Defense groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a powerful attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a 25% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Epic Control-Movement Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a powerful synergy between Control and Movement groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a powerful attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a 25% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Epic Core Resonance
mutations.description: Creates a powerful synergy between Core and any other group
mutations.synergyEffect: Core group provides a powerful attribute bonus to all other groups
mutations.effectDescription: Core group provides a 20% attribute bonus to all other groups

mutations.name: Quad Role Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a synergy between four different role groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack, Defense, Control, and Movement groups are present, all receive an attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack, Defense, Control, and Movement groups are present, all receive a 15% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Ability Amplification Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a synergy that amplifies ability effects across groups
mutations.synergyEffect: All groups gain ability effectiveness bonuses based on the number of different roles present
mutations.effectDescription: All groups gain 5% ability effectiveness for each different role present in the creature
